channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Proposed legislation would add refined fuels to the U.S. emergency crude oil supply

item.description: AI bots told to act as trading agents in simulated markets engaged in pervasive collusion, raising new questions about how financial regulators have p...

item.title: Outsiders see a circular economy. CoreWeave’s CEO sees a ‘violent change’ rattling the supply chain down to the inside of the earth
item.description: "It's a lot of companies working to address an imbalance that is distorting the globe," Michael Intrator said at Fortune Brainstorm AI.

item.title: Marty Supreme’s American Hustler
item.description: Chalamet and Safdie salute the me-first nation.

item.title: Gen Z spends hundreds a month on ‘treat culture,’ justifying it with the challenges of daily life—but that’s a ‘slippery slope,’ Bank of America says
item.description: The generation has shared in droves on social media about the little ways they’re treating themselves.

item.title: New York Legalizes Doctors Prescribing Death
item.description: New York Gov. Hochul announced last week that she will sign a bill legalizing medically assisted suicide for adults with a terminal illness.

item.title: Why you feel so anxious and stressed during the holidays, even though you’re probably just sitting around, watching TV and eating
item.description: One of the most robust findings from psychologists is that the effectiveness of rest periods depends on how satisfying they feel to the individual.

item.title: Ladies, You’re Loading The Dishwasher All Wrong. Here’s How To Do It The Right Way
item.description: The Federalist is here with a step-by-step guide on how to properly load a dishwasher and end your kitchen nightmares once and for all.

item.title: Kentucky congressman announces death of longtime aide and campaign manager
item.description: Rep. Andy Barr mourns the Christmastime death of longtime aide Tatum Dale, calling her the "heart and soul" of his team for over 15 years.

item.title: 2026 deadlines loom as Congress leaves DC with several unfinished battles
item.description: Congress faces critical January deadlines as lawmakers return, with government funding for 2026 unresolved and only eight joint session days remaining...

item.title: The Best Classic Movies And T.V. To Watch With Your Family This Post-Christmas Week
item.description: Here is your ultimate guide to the best old-school films and T.V. series to enjoy in the days between Christmas and New Year's.

item.title: Confused by baby goats, having car nightmares, struggling to move from LA to Miami Beach — Robots are just like us, exec says
item.description: "Robots have nightmares about cars," Serve Robotics co-founder MJ Burk Chun told Fortune Brainstorm AI. "Cars are also very scary for robots."

item.title: Artificial Intelligence In The Classroom Destroys Actual Intelligence In Students
item.description: Students should aspire to be more than mere 'prompt writers,' but minds capable of thinking, reasoning, and perseverance.

item.title: Netflix Clings to DEI
item.description: Young white men today know not only that the world is unfair but that it is unfair for the benefit of others by design.

item.title: 'South Park' writer purchases Trump-Kennedy Center web addresses, plans parody sites
item.description: If the newly renamed Trump-Kennedy Center hoped to snag a website that reflects that disputed name change, a comedian beat them to it -- months ago.

item.title: DHS arrests over 17,500 illegal immigrants under Laken Riley Act
item.description: More than 17,500 illegal immigrants have been arrested for crimes under the first law President Trump signed in his second term: the Laken Riley Act.

item.title: Nonprofit uses underwater technology to search for missing service members
item.description: Project Recover uses advanced underwater technology to locate missing service members from past conflicts. The nonprofit has repatriated 24 Americans.

item.title: What Is the American Heritage?
item.description: The static American bloodline that nationalists wish to defend against immigration has always been a fiction.

item.title: I Love Stupid Christmas Chick Flicks
item.description: I don’t mind when every conflict is solved by hot cocoa and premarital eye contact.
